morningBrief.headline: 4 New Runs Open
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 11" over the last week. 4 more trails opened today, expanding your options. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.

trends: Great week for snow - 13" in last 7 days

morningBrief.headline: Recent Snow Still Skiing Well
morningBrief.body: Zero new inches, but who's complaining? 13" this week means conditions are still prime. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.
